plot: In an industrial town in Mexico near the US border, hundreds of women have been sexually abused and murdered. As the body count continues to rise, a web of corruption unfolds that reaches the highest levels of Mexican society.
title: Bajo Juárez: La ciudad devorando a sus hijas
plot_es: In an industrial town in Mexico near the US border, hundreds of women have been sexually abused and murdered. As the body count continues to rise, a web of corruption unfolds that reaches the highest levels of Mexican society.
original_name: Bajo Juárez: La ciudad devorando a sus hijas
plot_en: In an industrial town in Mexico near the US border, hundreds of women have been sexually abused and murdered. As the body count continues to rise, a web of corruption unfolds that reaches the highest levels of Mexican society.

produce.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad (FOPROCINE)
